original: The open market. Only legal goods may be traded here, and transactions are subject to tariffs. More goods are available when stability is high.\n\nSelling enough of a commodity will temporarily resolve a shortage.
translation: 공개 시장입니다. 합법적 물품만 거래할 수 있으며, 관세가 적용됩니다. 안정성이 높으면 더 많은 상품들이 판매됩니다.\n\n충분한 양의 상품을 팔면 일시적으로 공급난이 해소됩니다.

submarkets.csv row 0002
[original data]
{'id': 'black_market',
 'name': 'Black
Market',
 'faction': 'pirates',
 'desc': 'The black market. Anything and everything can be bought or sold, and '
         'there are no tariffs. More goods are available when stability is '
         'low.
'
         '
'
         'Selling a commodity will not resolve a shortage.
'
         '
'
         'Black market transactions may catch the eye of authorities, '
         'resulting in cargo scans and reduced faction standing, unless the '
         'trades are carried out with the transponder turned off.
'
         '
'
         'Engaging in legitimate trade as a "cover" also reduces the '
         'probability of attracting the attention of authorities.',
 'script': 'com.fs.starfarer.api.impl.campaign.submarkets.BlackMarketPlugin',
 'icon': 'graphics/factions/black_market.png',
 'order': '999'}

original:
The black market. Anything and everything can be bought or sold, and there are no tariffs. More goods are available when stability is low.

Selling a commodity will not resolve a shortage.

Black market transactions may catch the eye of authorities, resulting in cargo scans and reduced faction standing, unless the trades are carried out with the transponder turned off.

Engaging in legitimate trade as a "cover" also reduces the probability of attracting the attention of authorities.
translation:
암시장입니다. 모든 물품을 거래할 수 있으며, 관세는 없습니다. 안정성이 낮을 때 더 많은 상품들이 판매됩니다.

물품을 판매해도 공급난이 해결되지 않습니다.

트랜스폰더를 켠 상태에서 행해지는 암시장 거래는 당국의 주의를 끌 수도 있으며, 이로 인해 불시 화물검사를 당하거나 관계가 악화될 위험이 있습니다.

합법적 거래를 연막으로 사용하면 당국의 주의를 끌 확률이 줄어듭니다.

original:
Trade with $theFaction military base.

Weapons and other military hardware can be bought and sold here even if they're illegal on the open market. A commission and better standing with $theFaction results in higher-grade hardware being available.

Will buy locally illegal goods as part of a no-questions-asked buyback program.

Selling enough of a commodity will temporarily resolve a shortage.
